text:
Campus Bellhops - Software Developer, Graphic Designer, Support Engineer

We're a college moving service with a nationwide footprint. We employ college students across the country to help with small the medium sized labor tasks. We're making money and we're trying to scale from our current 48 cities to 150. More info at https://campusbellhops.com/careers/ or email newnerds@campusbellhops.com
